thread.title: Oh-So-Hot! Ranveer Singh Carries Deepika Padukone On His Back, In STYLE!
thread.title_full: Oh-So-Hot! Ranveer Singh Carries Deepika Padukone On His Back, In STYLE!

title: Oh-So-Hot! Ranveer Singh Carries Deepika Padukone On His Back, In STYLE!
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Bollywood's hottest alleged couple, Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone , seem to be so determined to make their fans go crazy, and this time by showcasing their soaring chemistry!Few days back, we showed you the hot photoshoot of the duo for Vogue magazine and now gear up to see their crackling chemistry in these pictures of inside photoshoot.And you are sure to utter these words after seeing the pictures; HOT! HOT! and HOT!In one of the pictures, Ranveer Singh is wearing trackpants and 'DP' is written on his behind and we gotta say that Ranveer! It is the most quirkiest possible way to show your love for Deepika Padukone, in style and we are loving it! 
Aditi Rao Hydari Goes Topless For Magazine, See Her Sensuous Pics Here! Whereas, his ladylove Deepika Padukone too seen wearing 'Ranveer' jumper and she is looking smokin' hot in it.On the professional front, the duo is all set for their forthcoming release, Bajirao Mastani along with Priyanka Chopra , which will hit the theatres on December 18, 2015.So let's not waste time anymore and get ready to see their 'quirky-love' pictures here! MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 1/13 They Look So Perfect! 
Ranveer Singh is wearing trackpants, on which 'DP' is written on its back and Deepika Padukone too seen wearing 'Ranveer' jumper! MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 2/13 
This picture captures their soaring chemistry perfectly! MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 3/13 
The duo is so magical in these pictures. MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 4/13

No wonder, why they got such huge number of fan following! MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 7/13 
Deepika Padukone looking smokin' hawt, in this red dress! MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 8/13 
And make some way for this stylish picture of Ranveer Singh. MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 9/13 
And the duo surely know how to set the temperatures soaring, isn't it? MUST SEE! Ranveer-Deepika's Hot Inside Photoshoot! 10/13
